text:
@realDonaldTrump You can't even get your story straight about the St. John's photo-op, you ignored COVID-19 intel resulting in 40+ million people unemployed, 1.89 MILLION cases and 109,000 DEAD because of your ignorance and incompetence but we should believe you? Ok.
https://t.co/bWPLU78k4c
